original_text: His power is already working secretly to turn people against God. But there is someone who makes it impossible for him to work freely. That person will continue to make it impossible, until God takes that person away.
korean_text: 불법의 비밀이 이미 활동하였으나 지금은 그것을 막는 자가 있어 그 중에서 옮겨질 때까지 하리라

sentences.original_text: His power is already working secretly
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 능력은 이미 비밀리에 작용하고 있으며

sentences.original_text: who makes it impossible for him to work freely.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자유롭게 일하는 것을 불가능하게 만듭니다.

sentences.original_text: That person will continue to make it impossible,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 계속해서 불가능하게 만들 것이며

sentences.original_text: until God takes that person away.
